summary: This is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding a to-do list. The primary item noted is an 'Update on Epstein ccs' scheduled for Tuesday, September 3, 2019, indicating ongoing case coordination following Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Scheduled Update on Epstein Case
events.description: An internal update regarding the Epstein case was scheduled for Tuesday, September 3, 2019, as noted in a to-do list email.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The email subject and content reference a 'to do' list with an item for an 'Update on Epstein ccs'.
The correspondence dates to September 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing administrative work on the case.
